Name: Style Dictionary
Description: Build system for creating cross-platform styles from design tokens
Platform_Support: All platforms (iOS, Android, CSS, JS, HTML)
Integration: CLI, Node.js module, Figma via plugins

Name: Tokens Studio for Figma
Description: Figma plugin for defining and using design tokens with sync capabilities

Name: W3C Design Tokens Format Module
Description: Official W3C standard for design tokens format and structure

Name: Theo
Description: Design token formatter by Salesforce (legacy, no longer maintained)

Name: Design Tokens Plugin (Figma)
Description: Export Figma styles and custom tokens to Style Dictionary format

Name: Diez
Description: Free & open-source toolkit for expressing visual styles across codebases

Name: Radix UI Themes
Description: Component library with built-in design tokens system

Description: Google's Material Design 3 design token system

Description: Esri's design system tokens for geospatial applications

Description: Atlassian's design token system for their design system

Description: GitHub's Primer design system tokens

Description: First design tool with native design token support

Description: Display design tokens in Storybook documentation

Description: Academic institution design token implementation example
